backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining layouts, controls, and event logging with validation and CRUD query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented frontend features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables, fullscreen behavior, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theming and rendering the control panel screen and toaster.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal UI for creating new controls with configuration fields, validation, and radio/slider support.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: React context provider managing control layout state, syncing with backend, and handling save/create operations.
Renders different control types (button, toggle, slider, radio) and emits signals on interaction, handling edit mode restrictions and local state.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Displays an Add Control button with tooltip and modal handling, disabled unless in edit mode and layout is ready.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wraps a control with draggable behavior in edit mode, updating its position based on mouse movement.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Provides a button to toggle browser fullscreen mode with error handling and dynamic icons.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Enables importing and exporting of control panel layouts, validating files and showing errors during import.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Shows editable properties for the selected control, including ID, type, binary code, and radio options with validation.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Toggles between edit and interact modes with a button and icon change.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Displays a scrollable list of recently emitted signals with timestamp formatting and refresh support.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Sh: Empty placeholder file for a shared Add Control button component.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Us: Provides a card section for users to add custom React code or extensions.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders the workspace containing all controls, supporting selection and dragging in edit mode and clearing selection in interact mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Provides context access for control layout state, including selection, creation, updates, deletion, and layout persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Manages fullscreen state for a given element with cross-browser API handling and enter/exit/toggle helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth setup, login flow, stored identity restoration, and exposes identity state via context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Implements a shared edit/interact mode using a module-level store synced with localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent backend events via an actor, polling periodically and exposing event data and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Provides a mutation for emitting control events to the backend and invalidates recentEvents on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, fullscreen styles, sliders, scrollbars, and control panel visual rules.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates 4-bit binary codes and generates deterministic default codes from string seeds.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Returns default config values for each control type including sliders, toggles, buttons, and radio groups.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Triggers a JSON file download by creating a blob and temporary link element.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates layout objects for control panels and provides JSON import/export helpers.
frontend/src/lib/safeBrowser.ts: Offers safe wrappers around browser APIs like localStorage, hostname, and fullscreen checks.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
Renders the main control panel UI with workspace, side panels, mode switching, and fullscreen support.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control panel layouts and control configurations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature status, and scaffold-related feature requests.
